About Text: Experienced Product Manager with over 6 years of experience in product strategy, development, and lifecycle management in the tech industry. I am passionate about delivering innovative solutions that meet customer needs. Currently working in a cross-functional team to build the next-generation SaaS products. When I’m not managing products, I enjoy painting and volunteering.

Experience Data.title: Product Manager
Experience Data.description:
* Led a team of designers and developers to build a new mobile application used by over 100,000 users.
* Conducted market research and analyzed customer feedback to drive product improvements.

Experience Data.title: Associate Product Manager
Experience Data.description:
* Supported senior product managers in defining product roadmaps and managing product releases.
* Worked closely with marketing and sales teams to ensure successful product launches.
